MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH39 postcode area of North Berwick. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to commence repairs to a fault on our underground cable network at Castlemains Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:59am on the 2nd of April 2021.
